data.name: DTE_ProjectUnsupported
data.value: The project '{0}' is unsupported

data.name: FailedToAddReference
data.value: Failed to add reference to '{0}'.

data.name: FailedToAddGacReference
data.value: Failed to add reference. The package '{0}' tried to add a framework reference to '{1}' which was not found in the GAC. This is possibly a bug in the package. Please contact the package owners for assistance.

data.name: Debug_AddGacReference
data.value: Added reference '{0}' in the Global Assembly Cache to project '{1}'

data.name: Warning_FileAlreadyExists
data.value: '{0}' already exists. Skipping...

data.name: Debug_AddedFileToProject
data.value: Added file '{0}' to project '{1}'.

data.name: PathToExistingFileNotPresent
data.value: Path '{0}' to existing file is not found on disk. Cannot add to project '{1}'

data.name: Argument_Must_Be_GreaterThanOrEqualTo
data.value: Value must be greater than or equal to {0}.

data.name: Debug_RemovedFile
data.value: Removed file '{0}'

data.name: Debug_RemovedFileFromFolder
data.value: Removed file '{0}' from folder '{1}'

data.name: Debug_RemoveReference
data.value: Removed reference '{0}' from project '{1}'

data.name: Error_FailedToCreateParentFolder
data.value: Failed to create parent folder for file '{0}' in project {1}.

data.name: FailedToRemoveReference
data.value: Case insensitive search for reference '{0}', to be removed, returned more than 1 match. Request could not be performed.

data.name: Warning_FailedToFindMatchForRemoveReference
data.value: Failed to find match for removing reference '{0}'.

data.name: Warning_NoExactMatchForReference
data.value: No exact match found for removing reference '{0}'. Trying No No exact match found for removing reference '{0}'. Trying case-insensitive search...-

data.name: InstallingPackage
data.value: Installing NuGet package {0}.

data.name: UninstallingPackage
data.value: Uninstalling NuGet package {0}.

data.name: Warning_FailedToDeleteMarkedPackageDirectory
data.value: Failed to remove package directory '{0}' that was marked for deletion on Visual Studio restart.

data.name: Warning_FailedToDeleteMarkedPackageDirectories
data.value: Failed to remove package directories that were marked for deletion on Visual Studio restart: {0}

data.name: Warning_FailedToMarkPackageDirectoryForDeletion
data.value: Failed to mark package directory '{0}' for deletion on Visual Studio restart: {1}

data.name: UnresolvedItemDuringProjectClosureWalk
data.value: Failed to resolve all items referenced by '{0}'. This message can typically be ignored. The issue may be resolved by fully restoring and building the solution. If the unresolved item is a project reference this can lead to an incomplete NuGet restore result and missing package references. To ensure that restore is able to find all projects verify that all projects are referenced correctly and exist on disk.

data.name: SolutionIsNotSaved
data.value: Solution is not saved. Please save your solution before managing NuGet packages.

data.name: Error_WhileLoadingConfigForBindingRedirects
data.value: Failed to load '{0}', while updating binding redirects. {1}

data.name: FailedToUpdateBindingRedirects
data.value: Failed to update binding redirects for {0} : {1}

data.name: ConfigErrorDialogBoxTitle
data.value: NuGet operation failed

data.name: FailedToAddFacadeReference
data.value: Failed to add reference to '{0}'. The package '{1}' tried to add a framework reference to '{0}'. This reference is not required to be explicitly added by a package.
data.comment: {0} is the framework facade reference name {1} is the package name

data.name: ProjectNotLoaded_RestoreFailed
data.value: The operation failed as details for project {0} could not be loaded.

data.name: MSBuildPropertyNotFound
data.value: The {0} MSBuild property could not be found for project '{1}'.
data.comment: {0} is the name of the property that was not set. {1} is the full path to the project.

data.name: ProjectCouldNotBeCastedToBuildPropertyStorage
data.value: The project '{0}' could not be cast to a build property storage interface, which is required to get MSBuild properties inside Visual Studio.
data.comment: {0} is the full path to the project.

data.name: UnableToGetCPSPackageInstallationService
data.value: Unable to get the project's package installation service for project '{0}'.
data.comment: {0} is the full path to the project.

data.name: AccountProvider_FailedToLoadAccountManager
data.value: Could not get the account manager, unable to check the keychain.

data.name: AccountProvider_FailedToLoadVSOAccountProvider
data.value: Could not get the account provider, unable to check the keychain.

data.name: AccountProvider_NoValidCrededentialsFound
data.value: No valid credentials found for VSO account.

data.name: AccountProvider_TriedToShowUIOnNonInteractive
data.value: Unable to authenticate without prompting user.

data.name: CredentialProviderFailed_VisualStudioCredentialProvider
data.value: The Visual Studio credential provider failed to load.

data.name: CredentialProviderFailed_VisualStudioAccountProvider
data.value: The Visual Studio or VSTS account provider failed to load.

data.name: CredentialProviderFailed_DefaultCredentialsCredentialProvider
data.value: The default credentials credential provider failed to load.

data.name: CredentialProviderFailed_ImportedProvider
data.value: Failed to load credential provider from assembly {0}.

data.name: Error_MultipleFrameworks
data.value: Failed to migrate project '{0}'. The project may only contain one target framework.
data.comment: {0} is the full path to the project.

data.name: Error_InvalidJson
data.value: '{0}' is an invalid json file.

data.name: Error_FileNotExists
data.value: File '{0}' does not exist on disk.

data.name: Argument_Cannot_Be_Null_Or_Empty
data.value: Argument cannot be null or empty

data.value: Removed folder '{0}'.

data.value: Package stream should be seekable

data.name: Warning_DirectoryNotEmpty

data.name: Text_DeprecatedFramework_DocumentLink
data.value: migration document
data.comment: The text has the document hyperlink applied to it.

data.name: Text_DeprecatedFramework_DocumentLink_After
data.comment: This test goes immediately after the document link.

data.name: Text_DeprecatedFramework_DocumentLink_Before
data.value: The NuGet operation failed due to one or more packages being incompatible with your project. The '{0}' ('{1}') project framework is deprecated. For more information about how to migrate your projects to a supported framework, please refer to the
data.comment: This text goes immediately before the document link. {0} is the full name of the deprecated framework (e.g. ".NETFramework,Version=v4.5"). {1} is the short folder representation of the framework (e.g. "net45").

data.name: Text_DeprecatedFramework_ProjectList
data.value: The following project(s) target the deprecated framework:

data.name: ProjectUpgradeAndRetargetErrorMessage
data.value: Some NuGet packages were installed using a target framework different from the current target framework and may need to be reinstalled. Visit https://docs.nuget.org/docs/workflows/reinstalling-packages for more information. Packages affected: {0}

data.name: Debug_AddedReferenceToProject
data.value: Added reference '{0}' to project:'{1}'. The Reference was Resolved To Package (resolvedToPackage):'{2}', where Reference Path from DTE(dteOriginalPath):'{3}' and Reference Path from package reference(assemblyFullPath):'{4}'.
data.comment: {0} is the reference name {1} is the project name {2} is boolean flag (true or false) {3} is the project full path {4} is the reference assembly full path

data.name: CredentialProviderFailed_PluginCredentialProvider
data.value: The plugin credential providers could not be loaded.

data.value: All
